xal.extension.solver

Class TrialPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • xal.extension.solver.TrialPoint
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MutableTrialPoint

    public class TrialPoint
extends java.lang.Object
    TrialPoint is a collection of variables and values for those variables.
